snippet: CEDARBAUM--Miriam Goldman. With profound sadness, we mourn the passing of the Honorable Miriam Goldman Cedarbaum, who was the devoted sister of the late Ruth Goldman Schapiro, the aunt of Jane and Robert Schapiro (Lillian), great-aunt to Rebecca, Ruth, and Sarah Schapiro, and sister-in-law to Linda N. Schapiro and close friend to Linda's children, Joshua Solomon (Geula), Abigail Solomon (Jason Teuscher), and Kate Solomon (David Wasserman). She will always be a source of wisdom and inspiration to all of us. 1/3

She will always be a source of wisdom and inspiration to all of us. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CEDARBAUM, MIRIAM GOLDMAN
